src:
Delapan Tahun Perjalanan Karier, Tulus Akan Garap Album Baru
01 Nov 2019, 15:49 by Siska Nirmala
JAKARTA, (PR).- Penyanyi Tulus membocorkan bahwa dirinya akan segera membuat album baru usai menyelesaikan rangkaian tur konser merayakan delapan tahun perjalanan karier."Jadi setelah selesai rangkaian tur ini saya berharap bisa mulai masuk studio lagi," kata Tulus saat ditemui di sela acara Festival Sewindu di Istora Senayan, Jakarta, Jumat, 1 November 2019, seperti dilansir Kantor Berita Antara.Seperti diketahui, Tulus telah memiliki tiga buahÂ album dari rentang waktu 2011 hingga 2019. Album terakhir Tulus berjudul "Gajah" yang telah rilis di tahun 2016.Pelantun "Monokrom" itu mengatakan sudah memiliki beberapa materi lagu untuk album barunya, namun terkendala waktu untuk proses penggarapan."Materi sudah ada. Untuk masuk studio mesti disediakan waktu. Mudah-mudahan setelah ini bisa masuk studio," ujarnya.Meski telah delapan tahun berkarir, namun Tulus mengaku masih ingin terus menghasilkan karya untuk dunia musik Indonesia."Salah satu mimpi saya adalah konsisten bermusik sehingga saya bisa jadi bagian dari perjalanan musik Indonesia," kata dia.***

Baca Juga
text:
Eight Years of Career Trip, Tulus Will Work on a New Album
Nov 01 2019, 15:49 by Siska Nirmala
JAKARTA, (PR) .- Singer Tulus divulged that he will soon make a new album after completing a series of concert tours celebrating eight years of career. "So after completing this tour series I hope to start entering the studio again," Tulus said when met on the sidelines Sewindu Festival event at Istora Senayan, Jakarta, Friday, November 1, 2019, as reported by Antara News Agency. As you know, Tulus already has three albums from 2011 to 2019. Tulus's last album titled "Gajah" which was released in 2016 "Monochrome" singer said he already has some song material for his new album, but there is a time constraint for the cultivation process. "The material is already there. To enter the studio, time must be provided. Hopefully after this we can enter the studio," he said. years of career, but Tulus admitted that he still wanted to continue to produce works for the Indonesian music world. "One of my dreams is to be consistent in music so that I yes it could be part of an Indonesian music journey, "he said. ***
